KnowledgeBase.Title: isStructure
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex

Function.Description: The isStructure function returns true is the argument is Structure. Otherwise, it returns false.

Brief.Overview: The isStructure Function returns true if the argument {obj} is a Structure; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isStructure function is used to query an object to see if it is of type Structure. An alternate method would be to use the isType function using the Type argument as type Structure.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes:
Character, String, Symbol, Vector, BitVector, ByteVector, IntVector,
FltVector, ObjVector, Structure, Dictionary, Directory,
Matrix, NumMatrix, Integer, Float, Number, Complex

Syntax.Return: Returns true if arg is a Structure. Returns false if arg is not a Structure
